post.description: Executes script actions on the specified HDInsight cluster.

parameters.description: The subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.
parameters.name: subscriptionId

parameters.description: The name of the resource group.
parameters.name: resourceGroupName

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

schema.description: Describes the format of Error response.

message.description: Error message indicating why the operation failed.

schema.description: The parameters for the script actions to execute on a running cluster.

persistOnSuccess.description: Gets or sets if the scripts needs to be persisted.

scriptActions.description: The list of run time script actions.

items.description: Describes a script action on a running cluster.

applicationName.description: The application name of the script action, if any.

name.description: The name of the script action.

roles.description: The list of roles where script will be executed.

requestBody.description: The parameters for executing script actions.
